name: Mind-Front
bio:
**Mind-Front** is a pilot project hosted at (https://www.mindfront.solutions), delivering intelligent, data-driven market reports to support strategic decision-making. 

To help the n8n community, we’re sharing workflow solutions that address common automation challenges. Each template reflects our commitment to efficiency and adaptability, empowering users to streamline data processing and reporting, and focus on what matters most—insightful, strategic actions.
